meanings.definition: The act of creating or bringing something into existence.
meanings.sent1: Her painting was a beautiful creation of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist's creation was displayed in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The creation of a giant sandwich tower made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His creation of a new dance move wowed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The creation of a magical world in the book was captivating.

meanings.definition: Something that has been created or brought into existence.
meanings.sent1: The toy robot was a fun creation for the children to play with.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was proud of his latest creation, a robot assistant.
meanings.sent3: The creation of a giant ice cream cone made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her creation of a new recipe for cookies was a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent5: The creation of a new playground brought joy to the neighborhood kids.
